properties.description: Necessary property for a form
properties.name: _formElement

properties.description: Object with useful information
properties.name: _misc

properties.description: Object with usefull information
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Toggles the disabled status of the element
properties.name: day

properties.description: Value of the element when the element is reseted, if will also be the value of the element if no value is provided
properties.name: default

properties.description: Toggles the disabled status of the element
properties.name: disabled

properties.description: Basic font size from which we will determine all the sizes
properties.name: fontSize

properties.description: Space that occupies the button inside its parent container.
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Whether the element meets the requirements or not
properties.name: invalid

properties.description: Label for the element
properties.name: label

properties.description: Locale to be used in the datebox
properties.name: locale

properties.description: Date format of the input
properties.name: mask

properties.description: Indicates the superior limit of the date
properties.name: max

properties.description: Indicates the inferior limit of the date
properties.name: min

properties.description: Toggles the disabled status of the element
properties.name: month

properties.description: Name to identify the element in a form
properties.name: name

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the element
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Indicates the selectable values of the calendar (day, month and year)
properties.name: selectable

properties.description: Indicates whether its in toolbar mode or not
properties.name: toolbar

properties.description: Text to be shown for the element
properties.name: tooltip

properties.description: Determines the type of the date selection (input or calendar)
properties.name: type

properties.description: Value of the element
properties.name: value

properties.description: Indicates the format of the value
properties.name: valueFormat

properties.description: Indicates the format of the week days header
properties.name: weekFormat

properties.description: Indicates the first day of the week for the calendar
properties.name: weekStart

properties.description: Toggles the disabled status of the element
properties.name: year

methods.description: When focused, it adds the corresponding style
methods.name: _addFocusStyle

methods.description: Assigns the calendar's width and position relative to the datebox
methods.name: _assignCalendarStyle

methods.description: When focused, it adds the corresponding style
methods.name: _assignFocusStyle

methods.description: Creates the weekdays headers for the daysGrid
methods.name: _createWeekDaysHeaders

methods.description: Returns whether the provided date exceeds the maximum date or not
methods.name: _exceedsMaxDate

methods.description: Returns whether the provided date exceeds the minimal date or not
methods.name: _exceedsMinDate

methods.description: Fills the grid with the corresponding days for the provided year/month
methods.name: _fillDaysGrid

methods.description: When the monthsGrid is about the be showed, we handle the ones that the user can click on, and also point out the current month if needed
methods.name: _fillMonthsGrid

methods.description: Fills the grid with the year corresponding to the years range
methods.name: _fillYearsGrid

methods.description: We replace the format with the given data, in case the field's length is lower than its format then we add 0 as needed
methods.name: _format

methods.description: Recieves an object with a day/year/month and returns an object with the same values with the provided format
methods.name: _formatObj

methods.description: function_description
methods.name: _getCaretPosition

methods.description: Gets the next month, the year is returned aswell in case the current month is December
methods.name: _getNextByMonth

methods.description: Gets the next month days to show along the current month
methods.name: _getNextMonthDaysToDisplay

methods.description: Gets the previos month, the year is returned aswell in case the current month is January
methods.name: _getPreviousByMonth

methods.description: Gets the previos month days to show along the current month
methods.name: _getPreviousMonthDaysToDisplay

methods.description: Gets the selected text
methods.name: _getSelectionText

methods.description: Receives a keyCode and returns the string value (intented for numeric)
methods.name: _getStringFromKeyCode

methods.description: It shows the corresponding grid
methods.name: _goBack

methods.description: Handles the redirection to whether the month/year/day next callback
methods.name: _goToNext

methods.description: Fills the daysGrid with the next Month
methods.name: _goToNextMonth

methods.description: Changes the actual year, for the next one
methods.name: _goToNextYear

methods.description: Changes the actual years range, for the next one
methods.name: _goToNextYearsRange

methods.description: Handles the redirection to whether the month/year/day previous callback
methods.name: _goToPrevious

methods.description: Fills the daysGrid with the previous Month
methods.name: _goToPreviousMonth

methods.description: Changes the actual year, for the previous one
methods.name: _goToPreviousYear

methods.description: Changes the actual years range, for the previous one
methods.name: _goToPreviousYearsRange

methods.description: Maintains an aspect ratio for the picker relative to its width
methods.name: _handleAutoHeight

methods.description: Handles the date correction for months and days
methods.name: _handleCorrection

methods.description: Moves the cursor to the right when a subinput is being focused
methods.name: _handleFocus

methods.description: It handles the fontSizes for different picker widths
methods.name: _handleFonts

methods.description: Handles the typing and the date correction, if the subinput reaches its limit it jumpes to the next one
methods.name: _handleKeyDown

methods.description: Handles the key up event
methods.name: _handleKeyUp

methods.description: Handles the limits such as min/max date
methods.name: _handleLimits

methods.description: Hides the calendar

methods.description: Hides the monthsGrid

methods.description: Hides the yearsGrid

methods.description: Highlights the button and removes highlight in the previous one
methods.name: _highlight

methods.description: If a value has been provided by the user we set it for our element
methods.name: _initDefault

methods.description: If a value has been provided by the user we set it for our element
methods.name: _initValue

methods.description: Returns true if the month is equal/higher than the max month
methods.name: _isMaxMonth

methods.description: Returns true if the month is equal/lower than the min month
methods.name: _isMinMonth

methods.description: Whether the recieved key event has a numeric value or not
methods.name: _isNumeric

methods.description: Shows the picker and the corresponding grid
methods.name: _refresh

methods.description: On blur, removes the corresponding style

methods.description: Selects the day clicked and runs its default behavior if the user didnt specify a custom callback

methods.description: Selects the month clicked and runs its default behavior if the user didnt specify a specific funcion
methods.name: _selectMonth

methods.description: Selects the year clicked and runs its default behavior if the user didnt specify a specific funcion
